nouns.description: flora (countable and uncountable, plural floras or florae or floræ)

entries.meaning: Plants considered as a group, especially those of a particular country, region, time, etc.
A book describing the plants of a country, region, time, etc.
examples: He intended to publish a flora of the island, and drafted out a synonymic catalogue, into which he inserted from time to time elaborate descriptions drawn up from living specimens of the species which he was able to procure.

entries.meaning: The microorganisms that inhabit some part of the body.
